DataElement.preferredDefinition: Information about a family history of cancer occurances.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Statistical characterization of human populations broken down by a chronological record of cancer and cancer-related events and problems of family members and ancestors.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: statistical characterization of human populations (or segments of human populations broken down by age or sex or income etc.).

Concepts.definition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).

Property.preferredDefinition: A chronological record of cancer and cancer-related events and problems of family members and ancestors.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's medical background regarding the cancer and cancer-related problems of blood relatives.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The codes that describe a chronological record of cancer and cancer-related events and problems of family members and ancestors.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A chronological record of cancer and cancer-related events and problems of family members and ancestors.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A record of a patient's medical background regarding the cancer and cancer-related problems of blood relatives.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Changed workflow status to released as part of caDSR clean up. CDE released in 7/2007. mc 9/8/10
